Reviews.Title: Great cam
Reviews.Author: Trbass
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, GREAT resolution, very adjustable.These cams worked first time and gave strong, brilliant images at 300+ feet of wire. Outperformed cams I have used at twice the price...

ProductInfo.Features:
MONALISA New Powerful DSP, 1/3 Inch Format CCD Imager
Ultra High Resolution : 600 TV Lines
Built-in Fixed Lens (f=6.0mm), Intelligent IR Technology
Built-in IR LED(36EA) and Sensor(1EA), Min Illumination : Night(0.00Lux, IR LED On)
IP66 Rating, 66mm Diameter, 12VDC
ProductInfo.Name: CNB WCL-20S Fixed High 600 TVL Weather Proof IR 90Ft Cam (6.0mm)
